item.title: VMware ESX 3.5 Update 3 VM's spontaneously reboot.
item.description: A week ago i upgraded a customers environment to VMware ESX 3.5 Update 3 and VC 2.5 Update 3. After the upgrade some Virtual Machines (VM) spontaneously rebooted. After investing the problem we saw that after a VMotion action the spontaneously reboot occurred. We disabled in HA the option “Virtual Machine Monitoring” and set DRS to manual.
